Posts.Content: May 24, 2017 12:22PM LoveT wrote: reneeromer I'm sending you much prayer & positive vibes for your biopsy & results today! I consider myself a pretty rational and tough gal, but waiting for results & answers has really turned thrown me into an emotional tailspin! I was supposed to get my results on Monday but am still waiting. Hang in there girl! This site & gals/guy are very knowledgeable and supportive. Keep us posted & remember that little hummingbird visit when you're feeling down! -Terri

Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2017 01:00AM LoveT wrote: It really doesn't hurt much. They're good about numbing your breast. If you feel a lot of pain, let them know. They will up the lidocaine for you. It was more of a twinge feeling when they did the 4 cores. It definitely does sound like a staple gun though, so don't be alarmed. Plus no matter what, you are one step closer to answers!!! As far as work goes, I was a bit pooped from it so Itook that day off, but as long as you don't lift a bunch of things, you'll be be fine. Oh and good luck! Sending b9 wishes your way!
